name: BulletHell (brand0n_42)
description:
Controls:

  • w,a,s,d for move (if you can't move then restart the page.)
  • mouse to aim
  • left mousebutton to shoot
  • Esc to stop the game

Backstory:

You made a deal with the devil that you can do magic.

as mean as the devil is he gave you the curse of endless life

That's why you're trying to get a hold of the devil

but first you have to fight your way through his demons

and the lakein of god

because he found out that you made the deal

and sent his angels directly to you!
